summary: Alea is a beautiful breton warrior companion.   She is essential and marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
Brenton Warrior - Alea


Alea is a breton warrior, She is skilled in archery, and one handed weapons. Her favorite things to do are go swimming, hunting and to slowly drain the life out of her enemy's. She is a foolhardy companion and is marriageable. I'm planning on having her fully voiced in the future.



This is my first mod so if there are any problems then let me know i want to make this mod the best I can possible make it.



Alea’s Features
-Alea is located in dead mans drink in falkreath
- Alea is a distance follower meaning she prefers bows over up close combat, but if she needs to she will switch to one handed weapons.
- Alea is marriageable
-Alea’s body type is DIMONIZED unp

Alea’s Story

I was enslaved by the elves. When I was a kid my parents were in a elite group of Brentons to find out the true plans of the High elves unfortunately for me they were caught and killed and I was sold into slavery. The family I was sold to treated me like trash, The family made me sleep outside with the animals, they were awful. I ate with the pigs because to them I was less than human,to them I was a waste of life. I was their slave for 7 years before I did what any sensible person would do I killed them, all, then set everything they owned on fire and never looked back. From that point forward I always hated elfs. I could never trust them, there all the same to me. I hid from them in skyrim I trained myself with the Bow hunting anything…. or anyone. For 3 years I stayed in the forest hunting until I found Falkreath. When I was there everyone knew what it felt like to be hurt, so I stayed and this is where I wait.


- looking for female voice actor if interested contact me @ brandonjeremiah808@gmail.com
